게임제작 후기 게임. 시작부터 게이브 뉴웰의 목소리가 반겨줍니다. 그 이후 물을 실제처럼 표현하기 위해 텍스쳐를 3번 입혀준다는둥, 캐릭터의 얼굴을 실제처럼 표현하기위해 많은 물리 계산식을 얼굴에 넣었다는 둥의 개임제작 후기 입니다. 이 게임을 통해 소스 엔진의 어느 부분이 달라졌는지를 약간 이나마 알게 될 수 있습니다.

Lost Coast is a demo, released in between the original HL2 and Ep1 to demonstrate some engine techologies (like HDR) that were later implemented into Source Engine (yep, Half-Life 2 had no MBlur or HDR or "Very High" texture settings in 2004, and AA was maximum 4x (6x for ATI Cards)).
9/10 as a tech demo, but it's not technically a game.

After playing around with the level for a bit, I can definitely say that Lost Coast is a complete success. It's not available seperately, but it is available in the Half Life Complete Pack (which is on sale right now). Here, you play as Gordon Freeman, as you come across the tiny town of St. Olga, whom is under attack by the Combine with a gun that launches headcrabs into the town. The 14-Minute Tech Demo shows off what the Source engine can really do, and as a result the game looks beautiful. It's almost like a work of art.
 The level is paced very well here. You start by heading upwards on a cliff, where you encounter quite a few Combine soldiers blocking your way. The level has little cover here, so you must be aware of enemy positions and use your grenades well here. You are given a few other weapons along with the Gravity Gun to boost your arsenal. Once in the courtyard, you are allowed to take a small break and take in your surroundings as the game shows off the High-Dynamic-Range Rendering (or HDR Rendering).
 You then enter a church, and one small puzzle later more Combine soldiers enter. You are not allowed to leave until you defeat them all, which is something that wasn't really explored in the original Half-Life or Half-Life 2, so it's nice to see some different gameplay elements here (along with the aforementioned cliff). After you defeat the enemies, you are led outside where you confront a chopper in a very confined area. After that, the level is over.
 Overall, the game succeeds in the one thing it was meant to do: be an excercise in level design and act like a tech demo. This level is the very reason many maps in games such as Team Fortress 2 or the Source Counter-Strike games look so good. However, it's length really shows it's a cut piece of content (cut from Highway 17) and, being a demo, you wish for more. Then you go back to playing regular Half-Life.
9/10
Pros: A sweet, short level with brilliant level design that looks good in the proccess
Cons: It's length is short compared to other levels in previous games in the Half-Life franchise

消失的海岸线是对HL2所用的起源引擎HDR技术以及游戏的一些巧妙构思（比如，找路找到疯掉..）介绍的游戏，不得不说其画质以及光影效果在当时达到了一流水平，即使在现在也不为过时。游戏是附赠的，毕竟是原定HL2的一章的一个小part，但是也非常棒，如果不是要跟联合军打[spoiler]炮[/spoiler]真的是有一种度假村的感觉

Um simples teste de gráficos melhorados no Source Engine do Half Life 2.HL2 LC se passa em uma pacata vila na costa com a presença do Combine,bombardiando uma vila perto do lugar com headcrab shells.Você encontra um pescador que fala que você deve destruir o mecanismo da arma e abrirá o portão para você prosseguir,onde tu encontrará e matará varios soldados da Combine.Ao longo de seu caminho,você vai encontrando vários comentários dos desenvolvedores do jogo,falando sobre tudo que vem nesse jogo.É muito curto o jogo,com você podendo zerar rapidamente em o que,45 minutos mais ou menos? Bom,a única coisa ridicula é o preço : 55 REAIS para um jogo teste de 45 minutos onde você quase não vê diferença nenhuma nos gráficos supostamente melhorados (talvez você veja,mas ok).

Half Life 2: Lost Coast İncelemesi:
  
Öncelikle şunu belirtmek gerekir ki oyun tam olarak oyun değil.
Şöyle açıklayayım; Oyun aslında Half Life: 2'deki bir harita olacaktı ammavelakin dosya boyutunun büyük olması,
haritanın yetişememesi ve Half Life: 2'nin zaten uzun olduğu ve oyuncuları bayıcağı düşüncesiyle Half Life: 2'de yer alamadı.

Hikaye(SPOİLER VAR!):
[spoiler]
Uyandıktan sonra karşınıza çıkan bir balıkçı size kiliseye gitmenizi ve oradaki Combine'ları öldürmenizi ve bu sayede halkın rahat edeciğini söyler. Siz de gerekeni yaparsınız falan.[/spoiler]

Grafikler: 7/10 (Bana sorarsanız zamanının en iyi grafiklerini yapmışlar.)
Oynanış: 6/10 (Oyun kısa)

*NOT*: Ve şunu açıklamam gerek ki oyunu almayı düşünüyorsanız sadece 1 bölümden oluşan ve yarım saat bile sürmeyen bir oyunla karşılaşacaksınız. Ama nostaljiseverlerin almasını öneririm.
